AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: You can now install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

RegionPush.Title: Announcement: Recent Updates Regarding to v2.7 Update delay
RegionPush.Message:
In regard of official statement, v2.7 was delayed due to "project progress". Compensation will be issued to every players in every week. The compensation includes: 400 Primogems, 1 Fragile Resin, 7 Hero's Wits, 16 Mystic Enhancement Ores, and 120000 Mora. This compensation will be issued from May 11th, 2022 until further announcement.
For more information, please visit HoYoLab or In-Game Announcement.
